mdRecord.dcterms:title: Ophthalmoscope in case
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Loring [manufacturer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: The case contains the scope (01785a) and an ivory handle (01785b). In a hidden compartment there is an additional lens. The box is constructed in such a way as to let the scope and handle be placed in the box and the lid closed without disassembling the scope.
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Medical instruments or apparatus
